attributes.action: This petition calls for mandatory drugs testing for all members of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Athletes are tested regularly for drugs. They're not running the country. MPs should face the same tests. They are making decisions that affect all of us.
attributes.background: This petition calls for the mandatory testing  of MPs for the use of illegal substances and sanctions against those found to be using them.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105119


You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
